data.name: Root of the Firemind Foil Conversion
data.detailed_description: Convert all uncommon, rare, and mythic rare cards in Niv-Mizzet’s “Root of the Firemind” blue-red deck to premium foil cards. (Requires Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers. Full versions of all Expansion Pack game add-ons required to access all cards.)
data.about_the_game: Convert all uncommon, rare, and mythic rare cards in Niv-Mizzet’s “Root of the Firemind” blue-red deck to premium foil cards. (Requires Magic: The Gathering — Duels of the Planeswalkers. Full versions of all Expansion Pack game add-ons required to access all cards.)

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows XP with Service Pack 3
  • Processor: 2GHz CPU (Pentium 4 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 1GB RAM (2GB for Vista)
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or later
  • Hard Drive: 700MB
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Video: 256MB VRAM GPU capable of Pixel Shader 3 or better
